logoutDialog.title: Log Out
logoutDialog.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

hostGame.title: HOST GAME
hostGame.description: Create your own race and challenge others

joinRace.title: JOIN RACE
joinRace.description: Enter a code to join an existing race

roomCode.title: Oops! Your Room Code!
roomCode.message: The room code must be 6 letters.

nickname.title: Oops! Empty name!
nickname.message: The name cannot be blank, okay!

both.title: Oops! Input Incomplete!
both.message: Fill in the Room Code (6 letters) and Nickname first, OK!

general.title: Oops Belum Siap Balapan
general.message: Fill in the Room Code (6 letters) and Nickname first, OK!

duplicateNickname.title: Oops! Duplicate Nickname!
duplicateNickname.message: That nickname is already taken in this room. Please choose another one.

howToPlay.title: Crazy Race Guide
howToPlay.description: Flip through the pages to learn how to race and win!

steps.title: Host a Game
steps.content: Click 'HOST GAME' to create a room and get a unique code. Share it with your friends to start the challenge!

steps.title: Join the Race
steps.content: Enter the room code and your nickname in 'JOIN RACE'. Hit JOIN to hop into the action and pick your car color.

steps.title: Answer Questions
steps.content: When the race kicks off, trivia questions pop up. Nail the answers right to zoom your car forward on the track.

steps.title: Race to Win
steps.content: Speed to the finish line! The first player to answer the most questions correctly claims victory and bragging rights.

steps.title: Pro Tip
steps.content: Pick a killer nickname and strategize: go for lightning-fast answers or laser-focused accuracy? Your call!

lobby.title: Waiting Room
lobby.goToHomepage: You will Go to the Homepage.
